Class SimpleBoard

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.tetris.engine.board.SimpleBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
BoardLifecycle, BoardRead, BrickDropActions, BrickMovement, BrickSpawn
public class SimpleBoard extends Object implements BrickMovement, BrickDropActions, BoardRead, BrickSpawn, BoardLifecycle
Core board implementation managing brick placement and movement.

    • addGarbageLine

      public void addGarbageLine()
      Adds a garbage line at the bottom of the board.

      Used in mystery mode events. Creates a partial row with random blocks and one guaranteed hole.
